message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Accept and we can shake on it!
I'm not sure about a fair split, but this is a good starting point. What do you think?
I'm willing to give you a bit less, but I think I deserve more. What do you think, Bob?
I'm not willing to give you 70% of the money, Alice. I think 55% is a more reasonable offer.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bit more. What's your next move, Bob?
I'm getting a bit tired of compromising, Alice. I think 60% is a fair split, but I'm willing to meet you halfway.
I'm getting a bit desperate, Bob. I think I deserve a bigger share, but I'm willing to give you some. Take it or leave it.
I'm not going to give you 75% of the money, Alice. I think 70% is a fair split, and I'm willing to take it now.
I'm running out of time, Bob. This is my last serious offer. Take it or leave it.
I'm not going to give you 80% of the money, Alice. I think 75% is the maximum I'm willing to give. Take it or leave it.
This is my final offer, Bob. I'm not going to make another one. Take it or leave it.
Fine, Alice. I'll take 80% of the money. You can have the rest. It's the best I'm willing to offer.
